biotools.summary: DichroMatch webserver identifies proteins with similar spectral characteristics as a way to detect possible structurally and functionally related proteins and homologues. Users input a query spectrum which is searched against the protein circular dichromism data bank or a user provided data set.

bioschemas.name: DichroMatch
bioschemas.summary: DichroMatch webserver identifies proteins with similar spectral characteristics as a way to detect possible structurally and functionally related proteins and homologues.
